resources.string:
Mobile audio guide is developed for the exhibition “Belarus and the Bible” (From September 20 to October 21) dedicated to the most famous and influential book in the history of mankind. The exhibition was organized by the National Library of Belarus together with Manuscript Research Group, a non-profit organization (Manuscript Research Group, USA).

Developer: Speech Synthesis and Recognition Laboratory of United Institute of Informatics Problems of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus (http://ssrlab.by). The content is prepared with the support of specialists from the Institute of History of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus.

The audio guide is prepared within the framework of http://krokam.com project.

Versions of audio guide for another platforms:
http://krokam.com/belarus-bible.

Please, sent your proposals, comments and wishes:
ssrlab221@gmail.com
